__TOC__
==Description==
[[Gate Travel]] is a spell that allows the caster to open a [[Gate]] to a location by targeting a [[Mark]]ed [[Rune]].

Casting [[Gate Travel]] requires Black Pearl, Sulfurous Ash and Mandrake Root and costs 67 [[Mana]].

The words spoken when casting [[Gate Travel]] are Vas Rel Por and it's a Seventh circle spell.

==Usage==
To travel with [[Gate Travel]], you will need a [[Mark]]ed [[Rune]]. [[Rune]]s can be purchased from the mage shop and locations can be marked with the [[Mark]] spell while standing in the desired location.

Cast the [[Gate Travel]] spell from your spell book or use a [[Gate Travel]] scroll, then target the marked [[Rune]]. You will open a [[Gate]] to that location which others may walk through. You can also open a [[Runebook]] and simply click on the spell icons shown at each location.[[file:Open_Runebook.png|thumb]]
